metadata.name: High Court Standard Legal Notice
metadata.description: Legal notice template following High Court formatting standards. Suitable for pre-litigation notices in civil and commercial matters.

required_fields.label: Sender Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the person or entity sending the notice

required_fields.label: Sender Address
required_fields.description: Complete postal address of the sender for service of reply

required_fields.label: Recipient Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the person or entity receiving the notice

required_fields.label: Recipient Address
required_fields.description: Complete postal address for service of the notice

required_fields.label: Subject Matter
required_fields.description: Brief description of the matter for which notice is being sent
required_fields.example: Demand for Vacant Possession of Property

required_fields.label: Demand Details
required_fields.description: Specific demands, claims, or reliefs sought from the recipient
required_fields.example: Immediate vacation of premises at 45, Civil Lines, Allahabad and payment of arrears of rent

required_fields.label: Compliance Period
required_fields.description: Time period within which the recipient must comply or respond
required_fields.example: 30 days from receipt of this notice

optional_fields.label: Prior Correspondence
optional_fields.description: Reference to any earlier communications between parties
optional_fields.example: Oral demands made on multiple occasions

optional_fields.label: Supporting Documents
optional_fields.description: List of documents attached or referred to in the notice
optional_fields.example: Copy of Rent Agreement, Rent Receipts

template_content:
LEGAL NOTICE

Date: _______________
Ref. No.: _______________

To,
{recipient_name}
{recipient_address}

Sub: {subject_matter}

Madam/Sir,

Under instructions from and on behalf of my client, {sender_name}, residing at {sender_address}, I do hereby serve upon you the following Legal Notice:

1. My client states as follows:
[DETAILED FACTS AND CIRCUMSTANCES]

2. DEMAND:
{demand_details}

3. You are hereby called upon to comply with the aforesaid demand within {compliance_period} from the date of receipt of this notice.

4. Please note that in case of your failure to comply, my client shall be left with no option but to initiate appropriate civil/criminal proceedings against you before the Hon'ble High Court and other competent forums, entirely at your risk, cost, and consequences.

5. This notice is issued without prejudice to all other rights and remedies of my client.

Advocate
Counsel for the Sender
